title: CASTLE ROCK Season 2 Episode 4 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed! | "Restore Hope"
author: Think Story
comment: No ice cream scoop this episode. Very disappointed! 🍦
That scene with Annie watching The Wizard of Oz while miserably lying down on her couch in a bathrobe eating ice cream was a MOOD
Is it weird Joy just knows how to use a phone and computer even though she’s never had access to these things. 🤔
Chance is an emancipated minor. It is mentioned in episode 3 when the kids go out on Castle Lake. I don't believe it, tho. I think she may be WAY older than she looks...
Out of everything so far, the pickeled egg bite grossed me out the most.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and review episode 4 "Restore Hope" of Hulu's Castle Rock Season 2. We'll break down, review, and recap the episode while expanding on theories and Stephen King easter eggs!

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
